attributes.action: Lower International University tuition fees by 33%
attributes.additional_details: Most universities are not offering full support or services but international students who pay the most amount in fees are not involved in conversations about reduction in fees. A lot are not even within the countries of their universities and have become full time online students, even when offered mixed methods of study(online and in person)by their specific universities due to travel restrictions caused by the pandemic. They shouldn't be paying the full tuition amount for half services.
attributes.background: I want the government or parliament to lower the international student tuition fees, which range from 10,000-38,000 pounds by 33% across all universities.

rejection.details:
Fees for international students are set by individual universities, not the Government or House of Commons, but you may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Require Universities to partially refund tuition fees for 19/20 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550738

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762
